cpu_physical: grep -A9 'description: CPU' lshw.tmp.txt | grep 'slot:' | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/^[ 	]*//g'
cpu_threads: grep -A14 'description: CPU' lshw.tmp.txt | grep 'configuration:' | awk '{print $4}' | awk -F= '{print $2}'
versions: grep -A9 'description: CPU' lshw.tmp.txt | grep 'version:' | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/^[ 	 ]*//g'
cache_l1: grep -A4 'L1 cache' lshw.tmp.txt | grep 'capacity:' | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/^[ 	 ]*//g'
cache_l2: grep -A4 'L2 cache' lshw.tmp.txt | grep 'capacity:' | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/^[ 	 ]*//g'
cache_l3: grep -A4 'L3 cache' lshw.tmp.txt | grep 'capacity:' | awk -F: '{print $2}' | sed 's/^[ 	 ]*//g'
cores_num: grep -A14 'description: CPU' lshw.tmp.txt | grep 'configuration:' | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F= '{print $2}'
